## VertexOS Changes * Now Vertex 3.5 (Last Nougat Build) * CAF LA.UM.5.8.r1-02700-8x98.0 tag * Fixed GPS Disconnetting too much frequently * Updated to new rebased Arsenic Kernel * Solved lag problems * Dropped some audio flags temporarily * Fixed Screen mirroring/wifi display * Upstreamed with latest Vertex stuff * Minor optimisations
# Note :
Clean flash is always recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated if not clean flashed. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs. Note for this build: If camera still not work, do a clean flash. Also, check kernel settings with kernel adiutor and tune it, if you find lags (you shouldn't). Actually there is the chance you cant' eproduce AVI files from stock gallery. Use Mx Player instead. ---
